text: int max ( int a , int b ) { if ( a > b ) return a ; else return b ; } int main ( void ) { int t , n , i ; int * * p ; int k ; int tempval ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- > 0 ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; p = ( int * * ) malloc ( n * sizeof ( int * ) ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { p [ i ] = ( int * ) malloc ( ( i + 1 ) * sizeof ( int ) ) ; for ( k = 0 ; k <= i ; k ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & p [ i ] [ k ] ) ; } } for ( i = n - 2 ; i >= 0 ; i -- ) { for ( k = 0 ; k <= i ; k ++ ) { p [ i ] [ k ] += max ( p [ i + 1 ] [ k ] , p [ i + 1 ] [ k + 1 ] ) ; } } printf ( "%d\n" , p [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; } }
